page.title: 10SCOUTS
page.content: Scouts is great fun.At my scouts(35th Leyland Road)we meet every Friday night from 7.30 pm-9.30 pm .The evening starts with the flag being raised followed by an inspection of uniform.Being a Sea Scout Troup we wear a white hat,a neckerchief(green and yellow),a woggle and a thick woolly jumper.After inspection we "fall out" for a game.We have a variety of indoor and outdoor games that we can play,but we always welcome new games.About halfway through the evening we do patrol work which involves working for badges etc. After another game we say a prayer and lower the flag.Other activities at the moment involve swimming or sailing.
